title: Triple Rainbow? Puck Pieterse Sets Sights on Road, Gravel World Champs
content:
The newly-minted XCO world champion is skipping the rest of World Cup season to fight for two more sets of rainbow stripes.

Read the full article at Triple Rainbow? Puck Pieterse Sets Sights on Road, Gravel World Champs on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
